trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 열 형식에 표시 되는지 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 형식에서 파생 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>에 표시 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>상속 Visual Studio 디자이너의 컨트롤 관련 구성 요소는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>의 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No>디자이너의 다른 부분에 나타나지 않도록 하려면.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업은 필요 하기 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>구현 입력는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>인터페이스로, 일반적으로 디자이너에 표시 된 형식의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: 방지 하기 위해이 특성을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>형식에 표시 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤별 디자이너.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 특성을 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [특성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 기본값을 사용 하 여 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>속성 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the specified value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 초기화 지정된 된 값을 사용 하 여 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value, which is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref>, indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 값인 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"> </xref>, 열에 표시 되는지 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>속성 값의 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체가 지정한 개체와 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>현재 <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> 와 비교할 개체</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> instance with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value as this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정된 된 개체 임을 나타내려면는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 같은 인스턴스 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>속성 값이 인스턴스와; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 32 비트 정수 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"> </xref> 특성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 인스턴스와 같으면 임을 나타내려면는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"> </xref> 인스턴스이거나, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 열에 표시 되지 않음을 나타내는 값의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>속성 값의 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 열 형식에 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>열 유형 표시 임을 나타내려면는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 고, 그렇지 않으면 디자이너 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> 열에 표시 되는지 나타내는 값의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 특성 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>속성 값의 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>
